threepio.documenter
Class XTag

java.lang.Object
  threepio.documenter.XTag

public class XTag
extends java.lang.Object

A self-building class for a Tag from XML or HTML. Supply the raw text of the tag to the constructor, and properties are parsed out and put into a hashmap.

Author:
jhoule

isCloser

public boolean isCloser()
Returns true if the tag is just intended to close item

Returns:
true if the tag closes an item, false if it does not.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
returns the string representation of this XTag. parameters are NOT guaranteed to be in original order. artificially created tags for other purposes are NOT included.

Overrides:

genericPatternString

public static java.lang.String genericPatternString(boolean canClose,
                                                    boolean allowWhiteSpaces,
                                                    boolean caseSensitive)
constructs a String for a Pattern for matching tags of any type

Parameters:
canClose - - if true, the tag can be a closing tag, otherwise it cannot.
caseSensitive - - if true, CASE_INSENSITIVE option does not matter. If false, CASE_INSENSITIVE is needed to include lowercase tags.
allowWhiteSpaces - - if true, will allow matches to tags with erroneous whitespace inside tag.
Returns:
the string for the pattern.
See Also:
Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE

typedPatternString

public static java.lang.String typedPatternString(boolean canClose,
                                                  boolean allowWhiteSpaces,
                                                  java.lang.String type)
constructs a pattern that is used to match a type of tag.

Parameters:
canClose - - if true, the tags found can contain the '/' prior to the type, in order to close an object.
allowWhiteSpaces - - if true, will allow matches to tags with erroneous whitespace inside tag.
type - - the type of tag to match.
Returns:
a string representing the Pattern.

typedPattern

public static java.util.regex.Pattern typedPattern(java.lang.String type)
Case-INSENSITIVE Pattern for a type of tag (cheap).

Parameters:
type - - the type of tag to match.
Returns:
a Pattern for the type of tag.

typedPattern

public static java.util.regex.Pattern typedPattern(java.lang.String type,
                                                   boolean canClose)
Case-INSENSITIVE Pattern for a type of tag(cheap). Option to include closing tags or not.

Parameters:
type - - the type of tag to match.
canClose - - iff true, closing tags match, otherwise, they do not.
Returns:
a Pattern for the type of tag.

Parameters:

Parameters:
